title: feat: Add GitHub Copilot instructions
description:
## Summary

Adds comprehensive GitHub Copilot instructions for this C#/.NET TDS protocol library.

## Changes

- Added project overview and tech stack documentation
- Documented repository structure and architectural layers
- Added coding guidelines (naming conventions, async patterns, error handling)
- Documented testing requirements with xUnit/Moq patterns
- Added build and development workflow instructions
- Included best practices and commit message format guide
